POSTED 12.15.11
CRM Tool Training
Dear Clients,
As we are ready to launch the new SalesForce customer portal on Monday (12/19), we have created a training video to introduce you to some of the features of the new system, such as:
Creating, Editing and Viewing Tickets Searching for Knowledbase Article and Documents For Customer Portal Managers: The ability to generate reports Managing your agency's contacts
We encourage you to view the video, at your convenience, prior to logging in to the system. As a reminder, we have now disabled the previous customer portal. We will send your login information for the new customer portal prior to the designated go-live time of 5:30am Pacific Time on Monday, December 19th.
You may access the video via the MyVisiNet Support site under Training | SalesForce Training.
